short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlight text and jump instantly in your favorite website like (Wikipedia, Amazon) with the highlighted text as a search result.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This app is intended for reducing search time by making it easy to search a specific word in a specific website in no-time. 

Let's say you are reading an article, and in that article you find a name of a very interesting product. By highlighting the text you will see options like Youtube (so you can quickly watch videos about that item).

Linky will remove all the following steps so it can save you time: 
1. Copy text from a website
2. Open new browser window
3. Enter url of desired website
4. Click on search input field
5. Paste text
6. Press enter
